actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the Federal Power Commission from abrogating natural gas supply contracts between natural gas suppliers and electric utilities, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Electric Power Emergency Fuels Act - Prohibits the Federal Power Commission from abrogating natural gas supply contracts between natural gas suppliers and electric utilities, and directs the Commission to repeal any actions previously taken under which natural gas supply contracts have been previously abrogated or impaired.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the Federal Power Commission from abrogating natural gas supply contracts between natural gas suppliers and electric utilities, and for other purposes.
